name: Aastha
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Tum se hi din hota hai, Surmai shaam aati hai. Tum se hi, tum se hi. Har ghadi saans aati hai, Zindagi kehlati hai. Tum se hi, tum se hi; Chhode na chuthe kabhi, Todhe na toote kabhi, Joh dhaga tum se jud gaya wafa ka. Main tera sarmaya hu, Joh bhi main ban paya hu. Tum se hi, tum se hi
